title:
KYBO 3.0.0
***Drama***
Nicki Minaj My Time Again (2014) http://www.movshare.net/video/f3ab3116b2eff https://36.media.tumblr.com/19ca69eb3086ad6aca0dec136a160f69/tumblr_ni5kc0DAYi1rz9t5jo1_500.jpg http://www.urbanshowbiz.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/01/image158.jpg "Nicki Minaj: My Time AGAIN" showcases the superstar at her most raw and uninhibited as she prepares to release her most introspective album to date, "The Pinkprint."
Birdman (2014)
http://i1.wp.com/speed-cover.org/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/Birdman-cover-locandina1.jpg http://www.film.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/and-the-oscar-goes-to-could-birdman-be-the-first-superhero-movie-nominated-for-best-picture.jpeg A washed up actor, who once played an iconic superhero, battles his ego and attempts to recover his family, his career and himself in the days leading up to the opening of a Broadway play.
12 Years a Slave (2013)
http://www.edwardguthmann.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/06/12-years-a-slave-movie-poster1.jpg http://thecurrent-online.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/11/12-YEARS-A-SLAVE_2_web.jpg In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.
The Box (2009)
http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMTI4MDA5NjIwM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTA2MjY0Mg@@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://graphics8.nytimes.com/images/2009/11/06/arts/06thebox_span_CA0/articleLarge.jpg A small wooden box arrives on the doorstep of a married couple, who know that opening it will grant them a million dollars and kill someone they don't know. </item
Rocky Balboa (2006)
http://movies.geourdu.co/wp-content/uploads/2014/05/Rocky-Balboa-20061.jpg http://adventureamigos.net/wp-content/uploads/2012/10/rocky_balboa-10762.jpg Thirty years after the ring of the first bell, Rocky Balboa comes out of retirement and dons his gloves for his final fight; against the reigning heavyweight champ Mason 'The Line' Dixon.
Green Street Hooligans (2005)
http://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w396/z3LC4kI8azbeuHRGgDdWo6VBCdX.jpg http://www.elsbastards.cat/files/2014/12/GSH36.jpg A wrongfully expelled Harvard undergrad moves to London, where he is introduced to the violent underworld of football hooliganism.
Blow (2001)
http://www.new-video.de/co/blow.jpg http://www.etreacteur.fr/wp-content/uploads/2013/02/blow-2001-29-g.jpg The story of George Jung, the man who established the American cocaine market in the 1970s.
Rocky V (1990)
http://image.tmdb.org/t/p/original/nICz69nb22UjWQrm6n750t41gFo.jpg http://lh5.ggpht.com/-VVpwcSV0hHk/T60LJejNgNI/AAAAAAAADCU/ndGc1bR9k5Q/s9000/rockycinco4.jpg Reluctantly retired from boxing and back from riches to rags, Rocky takes on a new protege who betrays him; As the champ's son must adjust to his family's new life after bankruptcy.
Rocky IV (1985)
http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/51R97BQTCYL.jpg http://cinemassacre.com/wp-content/uploads/2008/04/rocky4.jpg After iron man Drago, a highly intimidating 6-foot-5, 261-pound Soviet athlete, kills Apollo Creed in an exhibition match, Rocky comes to the heart of Russia for 15 pile-driving boxing rounds of revenge.
Rocky III (1982)
http://image.tmdb.org/t/p/original/oh8jPR8qYeOrSk5EjEIL3ooir08.jpg https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/original/6qYptQG2ynJANbyjjYOt4fpHfxF.jpg Rocky has been holding the title as the heavyweight champion until he is defeated by a brutal challenger, and now must regain his fighting spirit through a big rematch, trained by an unlikely ally: his old nemesis Apollo Creed.
Rocky II (1979)
http://www.bakbulizle.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/12/rocky-2.jpg http://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w1280/eFkloBGJFSHIILWh40ItXtqhUFi.jpg Rocky struggles in family life after his bout with Apollo Creed, while the embarrassed champ insistently goads him to accept a challenge for a rematch.
Rocky (1976) http://stagevu.com/video/uxpzabqzahpg http://aforismi.meglio.it/img/film/Rocky.jpg http://adventureamigos.net/wp-content/uploads/2012/09/rocky311250341.jpg Rocky Balboa, a small-time boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight the heavy-weight champion, Apollo Creed, in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.
